Thomas Campbell was the youngest of eleven children of a Glasgow merchant. He was born July 27, 1777, aud received a university educa- tion. “His Pleasures of Hope‚’' which achieved instant 51166655, gave him the means to visit the continent and study at Gottingen. He refused the offer of a chair at Wilna and returned to London‚ where he came near being arrested as a Jacobite.
